para.text: The Butt Type Reference method takes the axis reference with respect to the mechanical stopper. To perform reference position return follow the procedures below.

para.style: margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:34px;
margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:34px;

li.text: mode on the main operation panel.
Select the axis to be referenced by pressing the Axis Selection switch. Z-axis should be selected first.
The selected axis move towards the mechanical stopper in the direction that have been set in parameter at a constant feedrate.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;

li.text: The axis butts against the mechanical stopper until the torque limit is reached.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;

list.style: margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:34px; page-break-before:always; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: After the axis butts the mechanical stopper the axis is retracted in opposite direction at the feed rate specified in parameter to the return distance specified in parameter.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;

li.text: From the return position the axis butts again(second time) the mechanical stopper in the direction set in parameter at constant feed rate.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;

li.text: After the axis butts the mechanical stopper the axis is retracted in opposite direction at the feed rate and distance specified in parameter.
